description:
Continue your painting adventure with brand new pages to color. The DLC offers 3 new chapters with 18 planes from Red Wings: American Aces. Use your imagination and painting skills honed in the base game to restore them to their former glory.


In Red Wings: Coloring Planes you’ve got the controls! With each historical plane, you get to decide whether to color it in the way it would have looked in its glory days or to personalize it with a wide variety of colors, textures, brushes, and stamps. The sky’s the limit!
name: American Aces DLC
